      • findAllNotAnsweredByStudent

        @Query(value="SELECT scene FROM Scene scene INNER JOIN Institution ins ON scene.gameThemeId = ins.gameThemeId INNER JOIN Student stu ON stu.ra.institutionCode = ins.code WHERE scene.id > \t(SELECT COALESCE(MAX(event.sceneIndex + 1), 0) FROM AnswerEvent event \t\tINNER JOIN Student stud ON event.studentId = stud.id \t\tWHERE event.studentId = ?1) AND stu.completed = false AND stu.id = ?1 ORDER BY scene.index ASC")
java.util.Collection<Scene> findAllNotAnsweredByStudent(long studentId)
